duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a full support service both face to face and over the telephone, to participants to manage their mental health
Work jointly with other health professionals
Provide return to work advice, guidance and offer in work support as required
Assist and support participants to sustain their employment
Record all participant related activities in line with our KPI's and professional standards

education_certification.credential: 1 years post-qualifying experience working in mental health related field
